message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can move on to the next round.
Time to take a fair share!
You're being too cautious, Bob. I'm willing to give you a better deal this time.
I'm not getting greedy, but I'm not going to give away too much either!
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about dividing the money fairly!
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Bob. You're not getting a free ride.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me, Alice. It's time to take a serious offer!
I'm not going to leave you with a tiny share, Bob. This is my last serious offer.
You're not getting away with a 1 dollar share, Alice. I'm taking control!
I'm not going to give up, Bob. This is my last chance to get a fair share.
